title: Charter and Comcast to partner on new streaming platform, giving Apple TV a run for its money
content:
Charter and Comcast have announced a partnership in creating a new streaming platform on 4K streaming devices and smart TVs. This new project will have to compete against Apple TV and other major streaming hardware and services like Amazon, Roku, and Google.

moreâ€¦

The post Charter and Comcast to partner on new streaming platform, giving Apple TV a run for its money appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Charter and Comcast have announced a partnership in creating a new streaming platform on 4K streaming devices and smart TVs.
